messages.message: @Chetan there are only 3 steps in there

uh oh switched up my flow links, my bad https://instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/georgia/FRB-doc-splitter/fs/Instabase%20Drive/workspace-chetan/train_doc_splitting_model.ibflow# <- that’s the real flow link @shaunak
So in V2, merge_files is intended to be the last step, there can’t be any other step after it.
Is this because reducers cannot be followed by mappers?
Yes.  I’ll sync with David on getting the post-flow-fns to work since that is the standard way to do this …
he sent me some docs — i’ll take a look at that tomorrow. it doesn’t seem hard to set up, but i’m not sure how to execute with a post-flow func. do i have to do it via API or in a special way?
the post flow python file just needs to be in the directory.  the binary compilation should include the file.
